article_title: Trump Bans Travel From Europe—but Covid-19 Is Already Here
article_description: Public health experts say the US should prioritize protecting vulnerable residents and halting the domestic spread of the virus
article_content: As the number of new coronavirus cases begins to decline in China  there are new fears that Europe may emerge as a center of the global pandemic  Outbreaks in Italy  Spain and Germany led President Donald Trump to announce new restrictions on visitors from 26   3550 chars
